page.title: 08Law and Order
page.content: Only one{policeman}works in our area. He is a Community Constable and he lives in a police house at Marr.Next door is an office,but no cell.Any one arrested is taken to Bentley.The office was built in 1952.Before that, the{policeman}worked from Adwick.The main offences around here are dumping, burglaries and poaching.There are also a lot of road accidents on the cross roads at Brodsworth.Most of the{crimes such as robberies and dumping are commited by people who do not live in the villages.Some of the boys from our school were witnesses to a{burglary}at a house in Brodsworth.The church has been broken into quite a few times but most of the things stolen have been recovered.{Law and order}is topical at the moment.There are more Community Constables to break down the barriers between people and the police.
